title: Generated report
mission: Produce a standardized intake-checklist specification for Art & Music queries that mandates (1) verbatim claim text, (2) source/context (who, when, link or screenshot), and (3) at least one provenance anchor (dataset name/DOI/link or paper title/author). Include human-readable templates and machine-validation rules (compact JSON Schema or equivalent), plus three domain-specific examples (visual art, musicology, performance) demonstrating filled templates.
